page.title: 01THE URCHFONT AREA
page.content:
THE URCHFONT AREA IS APPROXIMATLEY SIX MILES SOUTH OF DEVIZES IN WILTSHIRE.
URCHFONT IS A PICTURESQUE VILLAGE WITH A LARGE DUCKPOND IN THE CENTRE. THE AREA IS RURAL WITH FARMING BEING THE MAIN OCCUPATION AND LAND USE. THE VILLAGE ITSELF IS A MIXTURE OF ANCIENT AND MODERN WITH GREAT VARIATION OF ARCHITECHTURE.URCHFONT BOASTS A VILLAGE SCHOOL,TWO PUBLIC HOUSES,THREE SHOPS,A THRIVING CHURCH AND A LARGE ADULT EDUCATION CENTRE.
THE AREA IS A QUIET RURAL COMMUNITY WITH AN EXCELLENT FEELING OF COMMUNITY SPIRIT AND BOTH THE PEOPLE AND THE COUNTRYSIDE ARE CARED FOR.
